definition: the act of going out, pass from physical life and lose all bodily attributes and functions necessary to sustain life
details:
noun
- the act of going out
- an opening that permits escape or release
= synonyms: issue, outlet, way out
- euphemistic expressions for death
= synonyms: departure, going, loss, release, expiration, passing
verb
- pass from physical life and lose all bodily attributes and functions necessary to sustain life
= synonyms: choke
- lose the lead
- move out of or depart from
= synonyms: leave, go out, get out
